definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
(dialect) motorcycle/abbr. to 機車|机车[ji1 che1]

sentences.english: Motorcyclists and bicyclists are often the victims in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 機車與腳踏車騎士常常是這種狀況的犧牲者。

sentences.english: A clerk has just delivered the token by a bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 站員以腳踏車遞送路牌予司機員以爭取時間。

sentences.english: Today's bicycles are descendants of the earlier velocipede.
sentences.chinese: 今天的自行車是從早期的腳踏車發展而來的。

sentences.english: So he spent the next four hours painstakingly working with clay to make a tiny bike.
sentences.chinese: 於是他花了四個小時小心翼翼地用黏土做微型腳踏車。

sentences.english: No visit to Thailand's islands is complete without hiring a moped.
sentences.chinese: 不租一輛機器腳踏車，到泰國的旅遊就不算完整。

sentences.english: Bike paths take you past rural villages and farms.
sentences.chinese: 腳踏車小徑引領你穿越鄉村和農田。

sentences.english: We all appreciate the fine girls bicycles.
sentences.chinese: 咱們騎着腳踏車一路賞識柳綠粉紅色。

sentences.english: He pedaled off to summon a mason.
sentences.chinese: 他騎腳踏車去叫泥瓦匠。

sentences.english: Carpooling, walking or bike riding instead of using costly gas-guzzling vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 用公共汽車，步行或腳踏車代替耗油的汽車。

sentences.english: U is for unicycle so shiny and new.
sentences.chinese: 是代表單輪腳踏車很發光和新。

sentences.english: And so the pink moped is mine.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，我租了一輛粉紅色的機器腳踏車。

sentences.english: With the campus spread out so far, many students ride bicycles instead of walking.
sentences.chinese: 校區散佈整個海城，許多學生以腳踏車代步。

sentences.english: So he went to the back yard and looked at the brand new bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 於是他走到後院看那輛全新的腳踏車。

sentences.english: Cycling and spinning are also effective cross-training options.
sentences.chinese: 騎腳踏車或是動感單車同樣是交叉訓練的有效選擇。

definition: locomotive/train engine car/scooter (Tw)/(slang) (Tw) hard to get along with/a pain in the ass/damn!/crap!
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
